sqlQuery.name: taxon
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct organism_name as term, oa.COMPONENT_TAXON_ID as internal from apidbtuning.organismattributes oa , apidbtuning.datasetdatasource dd where dd.taxon_id = oa.COMPONENT_TAXON_ID union select 'any', -1

sqlQuery.name: extDbNames

sqlQuery.sql: select distinct dataset_presenter_id as term, dataset_presenter_id as internal from APIDBTUNING.datasetdatasource
